name: studio-analysis
description: React component usage analysis for multiple Sanity Studio codebases

scripts.analyze: npm run analyze:components && npm run analyze:icons && npm run analyze:ui && npm run analyze:ui-sources && npm run analyze:html-tags && npm run analyze:sanity-ui-customizations && npm run analyze:per-component && npm run analyze:prop-surface && npm run analyze:line-ownership
scripts.analyze:components: CODEBASE=sanity react-scanner -c config/react-scanner.config.js && CODEBASE=canvas react-scanner -c config/react-scanner.config.js && CODEBASE=huey react-scanner -c config/react-scanner.config.js && node scripts/components/convert-to-csv.js && node scripts/components/create-summary-csv.js && node scripts/components/generate-stats.js
scripts.analyze:ui: CODEBASE=sanity react-scanner -c config/react-scanner-ui-components.config.js && CODEBASE=canvas react-scanner -c config/react-scanner-ui-components.config.js && CODEBASE=huey react-scanner -c config/react-scanner-ui-components.config.js && node scripts/ui-components/convert-ui-components-to-csv.js && node scripts/ui-components/create-ui-components-summary.js
scripts.analyze:sanity-ui: CODEBASE=sanity react-scanner -c config/react-scanner-sanity-ui.config.js && CODEBASE=canvas react-scanner -c config/react-scanner-sanity-ui.config.js && CODEBASE=huey react-scanner -c config/react-scanner-sanity-ui.config.js
scripts.analyze:all-components: CODEBASE=sanity react-scanner -c config/react-scanner-all-components.config.js && CODEBASE=canvas react-scanner -c config/react-scanner-all-components.config.js && CODEBASE=huey react-scanner -c config/react-scanner-all-components.config.js
